    • Constructor Detail

      • AccountController

        public AccountController(android.content.Context context)
        Creates an account controller using the current activity.
        Parameters:
        context - The activity which requires a reference of the account controller.

    • Method Detail

      • loginUser

        public void loginUser(String username,
                      String password)
        The method to validate a user. Validation of a user requires all the parameters to be non-empty.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the account to be logged in.
        password - The password of the acocunt to be logged in.

      • regUser

        public void regUser(String username,
                    String password,
                    String email)
        The method to register a user. Registration of a user requires requires ths username and password fields to be filled.
        Parameters:
        username - The username as desired by the user, which will be associated with the account.
        password - The password as desired by the user, which will be associated with the account.
        email - The email as desired by the user, which will be associated with the account but is optional.

      • updateUser

        public void updateUser(String username,
                       String oldPassword,
                       String newPassword,
                       String email)
        The method to update an account information. Updating of an account information requires ths username and password fields to be filled.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the account whom's account details are to be changed.
        oldPassword - The current password of the account.
        newPassword - The new password as desired by the user.
        email - The email to be changed, as desired by the user.
